h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Captain Lotus-Vision
content: You'll find find Captain Lotus-Vision in front of a large group of kneeling corpses, which he can randomly imbue with magic to create a Withered Corpse that will come to life and attack you. These are nothing more than a distraction, but should still be dealt with immediately so they don't hamstring you later.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 2)' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Captain Lotus-Vision'.
The content is as follows:
You'll find find Captain Lotus-Vision in front of a large group of kneeling corpses, which he can randomly imbue with magic to create a Withered Corpse that will come to life and attack you. These are nothing more than a distraction, but should still be dealt with immediately so they don't hamstring you later.
